item.title: 2020 waylonwalker.com rebrand

item.content:encoded:
I documented the story of my 2020 waylonwalker.com redesign on my blog. This post walks through the tools and inspiration for the card design.
waylonwalker.com/dsgn

item.title: I just added react-headroom to my site
item.description: It was so easy to get a professional looking navbar with just 3 lines of code. This package seriously is so usable on mobile it is…
item.content:encoded: I just updated my personal site with a sick navbar with react-headroom.

item.title: Should I switch to Zeit Now
item.description: Netlify I have happily had my personal site waylonwalker.com hosted on netlify for nearly 2 years now. In fact I have hosted about a dozen…
item.content:encoded: Should I switch to Zeit Now?

item.title: git push without setting upstream
item.description: Finally after years of hand typing out a full I foudn there is a setting to automatcally push to the current branch. More realisitically I…
item.content:encoded:
Ship Code Faster with this one git config.
git config --global push.default current
